game.name: Valiant Knight
game.description:
Valiant Knight is one of the top liked action-packed challenges that are full of fun, thrill and entertainment. You have to put you in the shoes of highly courageous and brave knight to clear all the levels. Hurry up friends! Her beautiful princess is waiting for her arrival. He is very hopeful and desperately wants to marry with the gorgeous princess of the realm. Grab your weapon and make sure to find out the exit game on time in this brand new action game!

Her love is in danger so your job is to help this brave man to avoid all the dangers, grab all the coins you see on his way and rescue her before it is too late. We can understand that this adventure is a little bit creepy, but your sharp fighting abilities could help him show the path towards victory. Let help her to escape and prove your worth to be a king in this HTML5 fighting game! You have everything a lion heart, a sharp sword and a shiny armor to deal with your enemies.

Avoid the spikes and other obstacles on the way to survive the dangers and complete each level! Be careful and try to face all the creepy creatures that will lurk in the shadows of the dungeon! Change the direction of your king by clicking on the screen in this free online scary game! Try to keep your eyes on his step when he moves on the platforms automatically! Track your life points by having a look at the top left corner of the screen! You have 3 lives to use! Challenge your fighting and jumping abilities to the test in our more popular titles from the category of free action games without download!
